stdout:
Table	Create Table
users	CREATE TABLE `users` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `openId` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `name` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `email` varchar(320) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `mobile` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `loginMethod` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `role` enum('student','parent','teacher','admin','institution_admin','branch_admin','super_admin') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'student',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `lastSignedIn` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `institutionId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `passwordHash` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `emailVerified` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0',
  `otpCode` varchar(6) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `otpExpiry` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `resetToken` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `resetTokenExpiry` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `failedLoginAttempts` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `lockedUntil` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `googleId` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `facebookId` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `gdprConsent` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0',
  `gdprConsentDate` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `dataResidency` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `organizationId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `branchId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `users_openId_unique` (`openId`),
  KEY `institution_idx` (`institutionId`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=90001
